recommended_charts: Bar chart of papers per conference
Conference.data_quality_score: High - No missing data, consistent values
Conference.selection_rationale: Perfect categorical variable for grouping and comparison analysis

Year.visualization_suitability: Excellent - Natural time ordering, reasonable range
recommended_charts: Line chart of publications over time
Year.data_quality_score: High - All values are valid 4-digit years
Year.selection_rationale: Essential for temporal analysis and trend visualization

recommended_charts: Pie chart of paper type distribution
PaperType.data_quality_score: High - No missing data, consistent values
PaperType.selection_rationale: Provides insight into the distribution of paper types

PageCount.visualization_suitability: High - Can show distribution of paper lengths, papers by length category
recommended_charts: Box plot of paper lengths by conference
PageCount.data_quality_score: Good - Both source columns have similar missing data patterns
PageCount.selection_rationale: Provides a meaningful measure of paper length, enhancing analysis of publication characteristics

TotalCitations.visualization_suitability: High - Better representation of paper impact than individual sources
recommended_charts: Scatter plot of citations vs. downloads
TotalCitations.data_quality_score: Good - Can handle missing values by treating as 0
TotalCitations.selection_rationale: Combines citation counts for a comprehensive view of paper impact

CitationImpactScore.visualization_suitability: High - Can show comprehensive impact distributions and identify influential papers
recommended_charts: Bubble chart of impact scores by conference
CitationImpactScore.data_quality_score: Good - Can handle missing values by treating as 0
CitationImpactScore.selection_rationale: Provides a weighted impact score considering different citation sources and references
